com.hazelcast.jet.avro.AvroSourceBuilder

Packages that use AvroSourceBuilder 
Package Description
com.hazelcast.jet.avro
Apache Avro file read/write support for Hazelcast Jet.

  • Uses of AvroSourceBuilder in com.hazelcast.jet.avro

    Returns a builder object that offers a step-by-step fluent API to build a custom Avro file source for the Pipeline API.

    Returns a builder object that offers a step-by-step fluent API to build a custom Avro file source for the Pipeline API.

    Sets the globbing mask, see getPathMatcher().
    AvroSourceBuilder<D> AvroSourceBuilder.sharedFileSystem​(boolean sharedFileSystem)
    Sets whether files are in a shared storage visible to all members.
